heading_7: Frequently Asked Questions About Russia E-sim
content_1_heading_7: When does my e-sim data plan starts?
content_2_heading_7: The e-sim data plan starts at time of connecting with a mobile network or at the time of activating an e-sim.
content_3_heading_7: If the validity period expires, what happens to the unused data?
content_4_heading_7: The unused data gets lost, if the validity period expires.
content_5_heading_7: When should I uninstall or delete the e-sim?
content_6_heading_7: You should never uninstall or delete the e-sim. Because once the e-sim is deleted or uninstalled it cannot be retrieved or restored in the device again.
content_7_heading_7: What is the meaning of deactivating an e-sim?
content_8_heading_7: Deactivation of an e-sim means stopping the accessibility of an e-sim connectivity in order to prevent the unauthorized or fraudulent activities.
